title: Share your clipboard across the devices
author: krsoninikhil
content: readme.md cloud-clipboard need url my mobile. don't to type . don't to message myself.cloud clipboard shares data clipboard across devices. it allows copy one device paste another.currently supported platforms: linux, androidsetupdownload clone repo change directory it. only need cloud.py desktop.install requirements runningpip install -r server/requirements.txtregister yourself runningpython cloudcb.py register <username> <password>install apk your mobile.'re done.instructions usecopy text.execute command copy cloud-clipboard you are desktoppython cloudcb.py copy <username> <password>open app your mobile get text mobile's clipboard ( will be required next update).execute command update desktop's clipboard the text copied other devicespython cloudcb.py paste <username> <password>todorun clients background automatically update clipboard. ideas implementation?licensemit license
